q: of Public Prosecutions, said the Crown Prosecution Service( CPS) would conduct a`` comprehensive assessment'' of evidence collected by detectives about the`` phone hacking'' at the News of the World paper. The purpose of this assessment is to ascertain whether there is any material which could now form evidence in any future criminal prosecution relating to phone hacking, the CPS said in a statement. David Cameron 's communications chief Andy Coulson quit as News of the World editor in 2007 after one of the paper's reporters was jailed for secretly listening to phone messages of royal

of a fire raging through the nearby headquarters of the ruling National Democratic Party in downtown Cairo, intruders climbed the gates, broke a window and entered the museum in a bid to steal the mummies. But demonstrators in collaboration with security forces stopped the thieves and returned the relics to the museum- but they were already damaged, Zahi Hawass said.`` Only their heads were intact,'' he added. The fate of the vandals remained unknown. The Egyptian Museum, which houses invaluable treasures of antiquity, was

bid to take the crown in the talent show's seventh season. Despite rocker David Archuleta Cook's surge in recent weeks, the judges were uncharacteristically united in proclaiming early fan favorite teen David Archuleta had outperformed his rival. You came out here tonight to win, and what we have witnessed is a knockout, said prickly judge Simon Cowell . Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future.
